title: Matchsafe, "Bust of Queen Victoria", ca. 1897
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Circular, silver-plated, with brass bust of Queen Victoria in profile facing left, above which is blue enamel swag inscribed "In Commemoration." In blue enamel boxes on bottom right and bottom left of swag, are the inscribed dates "1837" and "1897." Box lid, which displays enameled inscriptions, hinged on back. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Bust of Queen Victoria", ca. 1897.
ca. 1897. Plated brass, enamel. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-264.
